function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Training gap for migrants leading to potential vulnerability in adapting to new Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stronger negative impact on migrant youth in the labor market","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in use of posted workers during the pandemic","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in labour market participation of services","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in the participation of migrant women in the labor market","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased job changes among immigrants","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher participation rate of immigrants post-pandemic","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differential impact of job retention schemes on immigrant workers, leading to potential overrepresentation in certain sectors.","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of differentiation in job retention schemes by nationality or country of birth, potentially leading to concentrated impact on immigrant workers in specific sectors.","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased employment rates for immigrants in certain countries","category":"Wealth countries","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low vaccination rates among immigrant groups from specific geographic regions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Access register-based vaccination rates","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Communication barriers contributing to excess mortality","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"International interdependencies and vulnerabilities in value chains","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trade-off
